FEATURE_DISABLED: 🛑 Sorry, this feature is currently disabled.
HELP:
/start - start the bot
/help - display this help page
/me - display your Telegram account info
/vpn - display your VPN access info
HELP_ADMIN: 🧑‍💻 General Commands /start - start the bot /help - display this help page /me - display your Telegram account info 🔐 VPN Management /vpn - display your VPN access info /vpn server - display VPN server details /vpn server with <N> GB at <Port> as <Name> - update the server's data limit and name /vpn add <User> with <N> GB for <N> weeks at <Port> as <Name> - issue a new access key /vpn edit <User>:<ID> with <N> GB for <N> weeks as <Name> - modify an access key /vpn remove <User>:<ID> - revoke an access key 👥 User Management /user <User> - display information about a specific user /users - display information about all registered users /nickname <User> <Nickname> - set a nickname for a user 🛡️ Admin & Moderation /op <User> - promote a user to admin /deop <User> - demote an admin to a regular user /ban <User> - ban a user /pardon <User> - unban a user 🧹 Maintenance /cleanup - manually run a cleanup
USER_SELF_TAG_ADD_SUCCESS: ✅ You have tagged yourself as {tag}. Your new status is now active.
USER_SELF_TAG_ADD_FAILURE: ❌ Failed to add the '{tag}' tag to your profile. Please try again.
USER_TAG_ADD_SUCCESS: ✅ {user} has been tagged as {tag}. Their new status is now active.
USER_TAG_REMOVE_SUCCESS: ✅ {user}'s tag '{tag}' has been removed. They no longer have this status.
USER_NICKNAME_SET_FAILURE: ❌ Failed to set the nickname for {user}. Please try again.
TELEGRAM_USER_INFO_MISSING: ⚠️ Unable to retrieve user information. The user may have hidden their identity.
INVALID_USER: ⚠️ The specified user does not exist.
MIRROR_FETCH_IN_PROGRESS: ⏳ Fetching a new active mirror. This may take a few minutes...
MIRROR_FETCH_FAILURE: ❌ Failed to retrieve the mirror. Please try again later.

🖥️ Server Details:
Name: {name:\} Version: {version} Created: {created:%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S} Hostname: {hostname} Default Port: {port} Data Usage: {data_usage:.2f} Access Keys: {access_keys(#)}

}
SERVER_INFO_UPDATE_SUCCESS: ✅ Server info has been successfully updated.
SERVER_INFO_UPDATE_FAILURE: ❌ Failed to update server info. Please check the parameters and try again.
ACCESS_KEYS_ADD_FAILURE: ❌ No new access keys were issued. Please check the parameters and try again.
ACCESS_KEYS_ADD_NOTIFICATION:
🔒 VPN Access Granted You've been granted access to a VPN server. To connect, follow these simple steps: 1. Click on your Access URL below to copy it. 2. Install and open the Outline Client app. 3. Click Add and paste your Access URL. 4. Click Connect. 5. Welcome back to the Free and Open Internet! | Android | iOS | Linux | Windows | macOS |
⚠️ Important Your access key{access_keys(s?)::s are: is} private. Do NOT share {access_keys(s?)::them:it} with anyone! If someone else needs VPN access, contact your system administrator to issue a personal key for them.
{access_keys:* *🔑 Access Key: {{name:\}}{{data_limit:? 📊 Data Limit: {{{{_:.2f}}}}}}{{expires_at:? ⏳ Expiry Date: {{{{_:%Y-%m-%d}}}}}} 🔗 Access URL: {{access_url}}}
ACCESS_KEYS_EDIT_SUCCESS: ✅ {count(s?)::{count} access keys have:The access key has} been successfully modified.
ACCESS_KEYS_EDIT_FAILURE: ❌ No access keys were modified. Please check the parameters and try again.
ACCESS_KEYS_REMOVE_FAILURE: ❌ No access keys were revoked. Please check the parameters and try again.
ACCESS_KEYS_REMOVE_NOTIFICATION:
🛑 VPN Access Revoked Your VPN access key has been revoked and can no longer be used. If you believe this was a mistake or you need continued access, please contact your system administrator.
⚠️ Important Do not attempt to reuse the revoked key{access_keys(s?):?s}.
{access_keys:* *🔑 Access Key: {{name:\}} 📊 Data Usage: {{data_usage:.2f}}{{data_limit:? / {{{{_:.2f}}}}}} 🔗 Access URL: {{access_url}}}
